name: Refugee and Immigrant Transitions
description: 'RIT' provides free education, family engagement, and community leadership programs. Our students have sought refuge due to war, violence, persecution, or economic duress. They work closely with partners around the Bay Area to ensure coordinated support and collective impact. They collaborate with schools, school districts, refugee resettlement agencies, and other nonprofits.
